Description.Text:
Position Set in Ragusa’s historic centre, La Dimora di Piazza Carmine is around 500 metres from the city’s cathedral.
Restaurant At breakfast you can enjoy a varied buffet that includes both sweet and savoury food, including homemade pastries.
More Informations Ragusa Train Station is a 10-minute walk away. Check in: 2.00 p.m Check out: 10.00 a.m
